summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackFor a long-lasting lip color that won't quit, choose essence 8H Matte Comfort Lip Liner!
details: DetailsFeaturesLong-wearing formula glides on smoothlyFull coverage formulaWaterproof formulaThe lightweight formula helps to keep lips feeling comfortable throughout the dayContains an exclusive sharpener on the bottom of its cap for easy applicationFormulated WithoutAnimal by-productsGlutenParabensPreservativesAlcoholMicroplastic particlesItem 2603068How To UseOutline lips with 8H Matte Comfort Lipliner. Closely following the contour, apply a corresponding shade of your favorite essence lipstick. For a glossier finish, apply your favorite essence lip-gloss. For a semi-matte finish, apply liner alone over the entire lip.IngredientsMethyl Trimethicone, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Acrylates/Dimethicone Copolymer, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum (Fragrance), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).
how_to_use: Outline lips with 8H Matte Comfort Lipliner. Closely following the contour, apply a corresponding shade of your favorite essence lipstick. For a glossier finish, apply your favorite essence lip-gloss. For a semi-matte finish, apply liner alone over the entire lip.

reviews.headline: I would buy it again
reviews.comments: Love

reviews.headline: Love the brand
reviews.comments: Nice color and love the brand

reviews.headline: Great liner
reviews.comments: Great shade, great product

reviews.headline: Great liner
reviews.comments: Awesome

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Great shade and creaminess for the awesome price

reviews.headline: Not my style
reviews.comments: Usually I don't buy lip products because I'm just not that good at doing a lip liner I tried it just not the color I was expecting I thought it would of been darker but the color is off for my skin tone but smooth application just not a color match for me

reviews.headline: 05 Pink Blush
reviews.comments: Smooth, creamy, easy to apply (no tugging), long lasting! Pink Blush is a bright pink that pairs well with pink and rose color lipsticks. This is a beautiful color of lipliner at a beautiful (low) price!

reviews.headline: Very affordable
reviews.comments: Goes on really nice and soft

reviews.headline: Color seems off from product photo
reviews.comments: The formula seems to glide on real smooth. But the color i thought id be getting doesnt match. I did an order pickup and when i got home to try this it looks more of a light brown nude. Im a brown girl and i despise the look having a nude color on my lips, it just doesnt go with my complexion, IMO. Definitely willing to try other colors though, i think this product has potential.

reviews.headline: Best lip liner
reviews.comments: Best lip liner. Great colour, great staying power

reviews.headline: One of the Best Liners!
reviews.comments: Cinnamon spice is the perfect medium nude shade. It glides on so smoothly, doesn't break, and it lasts all day (8+ hrs) through eating and exercising! I am so impressed! It's just as good as the Urban Decay waterproof lip liners.

reviews.headline: Best lip liner
reviews.comments: I buy this on repeat! So inexpensive and long lasting!

reviews.headline: I'm Satisfied
reviews.comments: It's not my favorite but I like it. It had a built in sharpener at the end so it's convienient. The color is cute and matte. It stays on for awhile but it's not long-lasting.

reviews.headline: Holy grail!
reviews.comments: I love this lipliner and how long it lasts on. I wear it for work 10+ hours and just have to reapply once! Love how it's retractable also, so you dont really have to waste product sharpening (there is a built in sharpener though). I'll always repurchase!!

reviews.headline: I would buy this again .
reviews.comments: I got very pale skin so just being able to find a shade of lip liner that looks good on me and is the color that I like is great .

reviews.headline: super great and affordable lip liner
reviews.comments: this lip liner is so pretty and it comes with a sharpener that works great! it's so affordable and looks very seamless and blends out easy while also being smudge free and water proof. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.headline: Nice shade and easy to apply
reviews.comments: Great color, easy to apply!

reviews.headline: I buy the sun repeat now that I have tried it
reviews.comments: One of the best liners I have ever used aside from some of the NYX ones.

reviews.headline: Amazing for beginners
reviews.comments: I really enjoyed using this pencil as a beginner trying to use make up. Affordable and got the job done. The only con I would have to say is that it does transfer, but it's worth it for the price.

reviews.headline: Online Color Not Accurate
reviews.comments: Colors are much lighter in person. I thought I was getting a true brown color, but instead a light nude. Pretty nude, but a bit too light for me and not enough contrast.  For the price, this is really good and would be gorgeous on someone with fairer skin.

media.headline: Best liner at a great price

faceoff_positive.comments: I tried the rosey brown as a liner and it stayed put. The color is so nice I filled in my lips and it made a long lasting matte winter color. Going to Try 2-3 more shades!
faceoff_positive.headline: 8 hr matte lip liner

faceoff_negative.comments: I loved the old 8h fragrance free waterproof lip liner so much! It has been discontinued and I'm so sad. This seemed similar, I believe it is the new version and although I like the colors, I absolutely hate the smell. Why add fragrance in a lip liner! But this doesn't even smell like a nice fragrance, it smells horrible and it tastes bad too. ;((( please bring back the old formula or at least remove the fragrance on this one!!! Please!!!
faceoff_negative.headline: Liked the other 8h lip liner more, why discontinue
